title: The Longest Day_ June 6, 1944 - D-Day
description:
The Longest Day: June 6, 1944 - D-Day
Written by: Cornelius Ryan
Narrated by: Clive Chafer
Length: 8 hrs and 46 mins 
Unabridged Audiobook
Release Date:03-02-12
Publisher: Blackstone Audio, Inc.

The classic account of the Allied invasion of Normandy....
The Longest Day is Cornelius Ryanâ€™s unsurpassed account of D-day, a book that endures as a masterpiece of military history. In this compelling tale of courage and heroism, glory and tragedy, Ryan painstakingly re-creates the fateful hours that preceded and followed the massive invasion of Normandy to retell the story of an epic battle that would turn the tide against world fascism and free Europe from the grip of Nazi Germany.
This book, first published in 1959, is a must for anyone who loves history, as well as for anyone who wants to better understand how free nations prevailed at a time when darkness enshrouded the earth
